title: feature request: prompt to save password
author: livilu
body_snippet:
**Feature request**: Prompt to save a new password if current is not working anymore

## Expected Behavior
sometimes password are changed due to security concerns or other reasons. It will make life easier if the app prompt to save a new password. This can be as an option or default behavior

## Current Behavior
Current behavior - SSH for example is that login is failing and server is asking a the password
